name: E. Modular Sequence
statement:
You are given two integers x and y. A sequence a of length n is called
if a_1=x, and for all 1 < i
le n the value of a_{i} is either a_{i-1} + y or a_{i-1}
bmod y. Here x
bmod y denotes the remainder from dividing x by y.Determine if there
exists a modular sequence of length n with the sum of its elements equal
to S, and if it exists, find any such sequence.
